Layer.neutralColor

Function/Meaning
Neutral color
Type
Layer class property (read/write)
Description
Represents the neutral color of the layer in 0xAARRGGBB format. You can also set the value.
The layer's neutral color is set to the neutral color of that type when the Layer.type property is changed.
The neutral color becomes the initial value used to fill the expanded area when the layer image size is expanded.
By setting a value, you can specify the initial color when the layer image size is expanded.
